price: Mbega burya nitwapfa tugacika ivu n’amagufa mu kuzimu, tuzoheza dusubizwe ubuzima tuzuke koko! Yemwe! Iryo zuka rero, riri kure nk’ukwezi, ntiribaho”.
arabic: أَءِذَا مِتۡنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابٗاۖ ذَٰلِكَ رَجۡعُۢ بَعِيدٞ

meta.transliteration: a-idhā mit'nā wakunnā turāban dhālika rajʿun baʿīdun
